TABLE.NAME: block_helpdesk_ticket
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the ticket table for the Help Desk block.

FIELD.NAME: summary
FIELD.COMMENT: Summary of a submitted ticket.

FIELD.NAME: detail
FIELD.COMMENT: Detailed description of a ticket.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time Created, self explanatory.

FIELD.NAME: assigned_refs
FIELD.COMMENT: Keep track of the number of assignment references to this ticket.

FIELD.NAME: firstcontact
FIELD.COMMENT: First person who touches the ticket other than the submitter.

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Group this ticket belongs to.

TABLE.NAME: block_helpdesk_ticket_tag
TABLE.COMMENT: A table that holds individual custom tags per ticket.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the tag.

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Value of the tag.

FIELD.NAME: ticketid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the ticket that this particular tag belongs to.

TABLE.NAME: block_helpdesk_ticket_update
TABLE.COMMENT: Every time a ticket is updated with a new status, it gets put here. This table will contain the full history of each ticket.

FIELD.NAME: ticketid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ticket ID of the ticket that this update belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: notes
FIELD.COMMENT: Comment that the updater leaves for the user.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The state of the ticket.

FIELD.NAME: newticketstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: if the ticket's status changes we may want to record what is was changed to here.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: type of update, not all are the same.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this ticket update was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time that this particular update was modified.

TABLE.NAME: block_helpdesk_ticket_assign
TABLE.COMMENT: Assignment relations to relate a user with id to be related to a ticket with id.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user being assigned to a ticket.

FIELD.NAME: ticketid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the ticket that a user is being assigned.

FIELD.NAME: iswatcher
FIELD.COMMENT: A watcher is a lesser assignment.

TABLE.NAME: block_helpdesk_status
TABLE.COMMENT: Ticket status table, where core and additional statuses are defined.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the status.

FIELD.NAME: displayname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name that will be displayed (overrides core get_string() calls.)

FIELD.NAME: core
FIELD.COMMENT: If this is a core status. Only the help desk should create these, do not add more.

FIELD.NAME: whohasball
FIELD.COMMENT: These should be defined in the code such as SUBMITTER, ASSIGNED, and FIRSTCONTACT.

FIELD.NAME: ticketdefault
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this the default status for new tickets?

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this status active? (closed and resolved are examples of inactive questions.)

TABLE.NAME: block_helpdesk_status_path
TABLE.COMMENT: What statuses can change to and who can change them.

FIELD.NAME: fromstatusid
FIELD.COMMENT: What status are we coming from?

FIELD.NAME: tostatusid
FIELD.COMMENT: which status can we change to?

FIELD.NAME: capabilityname
FIELD.COMMENT: different paths map to different capabilities. we are forced to use names since capabilities are not setup at the time this table is populated.

TABLE.NAME: block_helpdesk_watcher
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me
